text_content:
The Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) relies on a host of goods and services from private sector vendors to maintain our facilities and ensure our technologies are state-of-the-art.
DMV encourages women-owned, minority-owned and small businesses to participate. DMV does not discriminate based on race, religion, color, sex, national origin, age or disability or against faith-based organizations.
If you are interested in a business opportunity with DMV, you may visit the
eVA website
. eVA is a web-based purchasing system used by many Virginia government entities. State agencies, colleges, universities and many local governments use eVA to announce bid opportunities, invite bidders, receive quotes and place orders for goods and services.
